replies.author: cc7w
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=506954
阅读本贴
尝试移除所有客户端mod
将服务端mod移动到客户端

然后再重新添加基础mod

replies.author: nikoniko_ni
replies.txt_content: 问题很简单，你的客户端里有服务器没装的mod
